title: ANOTHER WORLD IS POSSIBLE
text:
Se puede encontrar m치s barato (you can find cheaper).
pero CENTAURO es transparente, sin costes ocultos como el fraudulento CAR DEL MAR. Los coches de CENTAURO son entregados en perfecto estado y limpios, el reembolso del combustible es exacto y puntual. La tramitaci칩n es muy r치pida. Los califico EXCELENTES, y encontrar otros por unos pocos euros menos no merece la pena, CENTAURO te da tranquilidad en tu reserva de coche.
(But CENTAURO is transparent, with no hidden costs like the fraudulent CAR DEL MAR. CENTAURO vehicles are delivered in perfect condition and clean, fuel reimbursement is accurate and timely. Reservation is very quick. I have to rate them as EXCELLENT, and finding others for a few euros less is not worthly, CENTAURO gives you peace of mind in your car reservation).
NUNCA, NUNCA, reserves un coche con CAR DEL MAR - NEVER, NEVER reserve a car with CAR DEL MAR. Busca en google "fraude CAR DEL MAR" y ver치s en lo que te puedes meter - Seek in google "fraudE CAR DEL MAR" and see into what you can get trapped.
Mis felicitaciones al personal de Centauro San Javier.
